entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
